content: alexcrichton requested dicej for a review on PR #12569.

alexcrichton opened PR #12569 from alexcrichton:fix-a-test to bytecodealliance:main:

This fixes a mistake in the test added in #12185 where the test passes both with and without the changes in that commit due to the way it was structured. Restructuring the test, notably not waiting for write_via_stream to return, means that it's now accurately testing that the TaskExit value is used.

  • Explain why this change is needed. If the details are in an issue already,
    this can be brief.

alexcrichton added PR #12569 Fix the hello-stdout-post-return-test to the merge queue.
alexcrichton removed PR #12569 Fix the hello-stdout-post-return-test from the merge queue.
